title: 16 "Curse of the Egyptian Pharaoh - Part III"(Japanese:「埃及大王呪術地獄」〜第四段〜) January 21, 2000(2000-01-21)
transformers_text: 16 Curse of the Egyptian Pharaoh Part III Japanese January 21 2000 2000 01 21 During the investigation Is shiki the museum's manager becomes the main suspect but he seems to have a watertight alibi because he lives a long distance from the museum Sakon suspects that he is living nearby with a female museum staff member Takahashi but then she is killed in the museum by a falling statue
tf_idf_text: curse egyptian pharaoh part japanese january investigation shiki museum manager become main suspect seem watertight alibi life long distance museum sakon suspect live nearby female museum staff member takahashi kill museum fall statue
